Text.Page:
The sikandaris are panicked because we haven't recovered all of their eggs from the Hatchery. To keep them on our side, we're making an extra effort to rescue them.

Hunt down the {@LinkCreature:57#12#inexorable akalath warlords} and {@LinkCreature:57#22#ebon fimbrilisks}.

Report to Chrona at Accipiter Watchpost when mission is complete.
You've earned the thanks of the federation!
It looks like you haven't completed your mission yet.
